only_disable_interactions: //Items here will not be able to be right-clicked (Interact)
//Keep in mind this already is applied to blacklisted items
only_disable_attacks: //Items here will not be able to be used to attack
//Keep in mind this already is applied to blacklisted items
only_disable_recipes: //Items here will get their recipes disabled
//Keep in mind this already is applied to blacklisted items
